entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blocked] Testing on Ubuntu 24.04+ #110489
  • Consider removing timezones in tests that rely on `tzdata-legacy` #110488
    10.0.0
  • Strange OutOfMemory exceptions on Linux ppc64le #110487
  • [browser][Windows] Assembly reference with Unicode path cannot be resolved on Windows #110482
    10.0.0
  • System.Uri.ToString() throws despite Uri.TryCreate succeeding #110480
    Future
  • [Android] CoreCLR uses APIs available only since Android API28 #110470
  • [API Proposal]: JsonUnmappedMemberHandling.DisallowExceptTypeDiscriminator #110466
  • sbyte* is not same as byte* #110462

Closed

  • C++/CLI __declspec(appdomain) static variables cause a C++/CLI binary to fail to load. #110365
    10.0.0
  • Proposal: API for fetching trimming information #109696
  • Add support for specifying DOTNET_DiagnosticPortDefaultPrefix #110473
  • HttpClient SafeAccessTokenHandle disposed issue in WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonatedAsync #108408
  • Authentication is failing for domain user while connecting winrm with Negotiate auth type from the Ubuntu Linux #108878
  • [Win11] [Bug] [ConcurrentBag regression in .Net 9] System.AccessViolationException: 'Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt.' #110355
    9.0.x
  • Extend Regex alternation source generator optimization for backtracking #62441
    Future
  • Improve code coverage of RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #67720
    Future
  • Failure in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexIgnoreCaseTests.Unicode_IgnoreCase_Tests #69406
    Future
  • timeout running RegexMatchTests.Match_VaryingLengthStrings_Huge(engine: NonBacktracking) #70674
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_* #75549
    Future
  • Clean up ref files to more closely match GenerateReferenceSource #26187
    Future
  • Enable compilation support in System.CodeDom #18768
    Future
  • Port re2 regex tests #61896
    Future
  • Port nim regex tests #61895
    Future
  • Uppercase #110446
  • net9.0, coreclr.dll exception code: 0xc0000602 #110099
  • CMake doesn't find brotli modules when building with CLR_CMAKE_USE_SYSTEM_BROTLI #109105

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix C++/CLI applications which use __declspec(appdomain) #110495
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: extract BBJ_COND to BBJ_ALWAYS profile repair as utility #110494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • release/9.0-staging -- Update Alpine, Debian, and Fedora versions #110493
    needs-area-label
  • release/8.0-staging -- Update Alpine and Fedora versions #110492
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Fix calculation of `MethodDesc` optional slot addresses #110491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `VisitLoopBlocksLexical` utility #110490
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: add more "simple" complexity helpers #110486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that we don't try and optimize masks for promoted fields #110485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugger] Fix a step that becomes a go #110484
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110481
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix nullability of LocalCertificateSelectionCallback return #110479
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Speed up surrogate validation in HttpUtility #110478
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Add Alpine and Ubuntu versions #110476
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Beginnings of native Android build #110471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • Share threadpool configuration #110469
    area-System.Threading
  • [mono][interp] Remove no_inlining functionality for dead bblocks #110468
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix JIT_LMul optimization #110467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Normalization APIs using the spans #110465
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Remove 2 more casting helper method frames #110064
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix C++/CLI applications which use __declspec(appdomain) #110367
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: remove is rare check from finally cloning #110483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ConditionalWeakTable - don't link Containers when no entries are transferred #108941
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • JIT: Remove `fgFirstColdBlock` checks in frontend phases #110452
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Lazily-initialize RegexCompiler's cached reflection members #109283
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: Don't run `fgComputeBlockWeights` in MinOpts #110451
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: generalize empty try/catch to also handle empty try/fault #110464
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Bump serialize-javascript #108883
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.12
  • Don't do opportunistic ISA lightup if there are plans to run the AltJit code #110419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area-owners with up-to-date information about community triagers. #110460
    area-Meta
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #109580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan (Try 2) #109707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Gc poll without HELPER_METHOD_FRAME #109378
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow stack size to be configured for native AOT #110455
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Re-enable bundle archive building in source build #110448
    blocked, blocking, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix for "ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: _Uaarch64_setcontext" when doing build for FreeBSD-arm64 using internal libunwind #110432
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Handle no method def token when trying to get the IL version state #110449
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110440
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110438
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Propose new async API #110420
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • fix wrong arguments order in CrlCacheExpired call #110457
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [Android] Put Java JNI function in a separate static library #108513
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2596490 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix TensorExtensions.StdDev #110392
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Remove some RuntimeExport/RuntimeImport indirections #110437
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix `IDE0251: Make member readonly` #110459
    area-Meta, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Handling metadata of primitive numeric Swift types with C# counterparts #2861

PullRequests

Created

  • Tagged pointer prototype and ready to run interpreter integration study #2863
    * NO MERGE *

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] Formatting, typos, renamed SwiftHandle #2862
    area-SwiftBindings
  • Status and incomplete fat `Precode` pointer. #2780
    area-CoreclrInterpreter

Updated

  • Add documents on the Mono interpreter analysis #2857
    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • [RuntimeAsync] Switch the implementation to the new shape of runtime async methods. #2818
    area-async
  • Interp doc for implementation of calls #2858
  • [SwiftBindings] Added pinvokes for handling ARC #2860

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect list patttern formatting #45363
  • .NET 9 AppCrash when published in release configuration, x86 #45349

Closed

  • GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined error in dotnet SDK when installed via snap #40272
  • NuGet config file name inconsistent when accessing via WSL UNC paths #45357
  • dotnet tool update did not install the latest version #43089

PullRequests

Created

  • Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45364
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers
  • Change the Windows dev versions leg to x86 #45362
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary architecture parameter in vmr-build.yml #45361
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Ubuntu non dev versions leg from validation stage #45360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unified Build publishing #45359
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check how often each command resolver is used #45356
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build the .NET SDK installer using the ASP.NET Core Runtime MSI instead of the wixlib #45346
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Review for breaking changes, breaking-change, Area-CLI, Area-VS, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Updated

  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix BuildPass>1 artifacts and asset manifest content #45323
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Invoke dotnet nuget why directly through API #44614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Remove global usings from projects building source packages #45339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Restore detailed test logging to console output #45343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use legacy WASM APIs when newer ones are not available #45317
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Bump MSTest templates to 3.6.4 #45278
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-DotNet Test
  • Add mstest dependency #45322
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • VMR: Temporarily disable tests on AzureLinux_x64_Cross_Mono #45276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #45263
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Avoid synthesizing parameterless struct constructors #5552
  • [Proposal]: Extensions as static types #8474
  • Add collection literal support for `Memory<T>` and `ReadOnlyMemory<T>`. #8144
  • [Proposal]: Params collections and older language versions #8061
  • [Proposal]: Field and value as contextual keywords #7964
  • Compiler can't determine best common type for `switch` expression #8025
  • Extension lowering #7771
  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544
  • [Proposal]: Recent changes to ref fields specification #6337
  • [Proposal]: `NotNullWhenMember` attribute #5600
  • Proposal: Allow nullable types in declaration patterns #4724
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: Cancel Async Functions Without Throw #4565
  • [Proposal]: get/set attribute targets for applying attributes on getters and setters #4425
  • [Proposal]: Allow nameof(method parameter) outside the method. #4413
  • [Proposal]: [Zero-length fixed buffers] #4381
  • [Proposal]: Inline variable declaration and discarding for ref parameters #4355
  • Anonymous Interface Objects #4301
  • [Proposal]: Improvement to nullable flow analysis when type can be determined #4283
  • Modify MemberNotNullAttribute to be applied to constructors (add AttributeTargets.Constructor) #4299
  • [Proposal]: Method Assignment Operator (.=) #4253
  • [Proposal]: [Friend Classes Sugar via Partial Nested Classes] #4211
  • [Proposal]: Explicit Interface Implementation for property setter #4190
  • [Proposal]: One-time event subscription #4166
  • Proposal: Allow multiple top-level statements per assembly #4163
  • [Proposal]: #pragma warning *enable* #3986
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: Extend indexers to object initializers #3882
  • Please open discussions as Discussions! #3864
  • [Proposal] Named generic type constraints #3813
  • Consider supporting varargs calling conv in function pointers to unblock interop scenarios #3718
  • [Proposal] Unsafe expression syntax #3677
  • Allow null-conditional access operator when accessing a pointer type #3619
  • Relax CS0030 to not error on conversion of IDynamicInterfaceCastable #3575
  • Proposal: allow ref enumeration over arrays #3542
  • Enum extensions #3491
  • [Proposal] Designated initializers for arrays #3462
  • Allow implicit casting from T** to void** and higher void pointer arities #3453
  • [Proposal] Functional Interfaces #3452
  • Allow generic extension methods with 'this in T' and T struct to compile #3429
  • [Proposal] Have 'is' operator type pattern assign value if right-hand variable already exists within scope #3422
  • Consider changing the inferred type of stackalloc to a Span<T> instead of a T* if using a safe context #3400
  • Allow direct casting between type parameters and all types #3341
  • Documentation: switch expressions #3255
  • Proposal: Opt-out attribute for collection initialization #3211
  • Ref locals in looping constructs — strange spec/functionality gap #3209
  • Precondition enforcement using 'requires' keyword #3139
  • readonly members on interfaces #3055
  • Proposal: Type extracting patterns #3050
  • Xmldoc: allow reference to inherited member without qualification #2972
  • Proposal: change the semantics of a using declaration combined with an object initializer #2930
  • UTF8 String Literals - Draft Specification #2911
  • Proposal: allow System.Range to work with extension method Slice(this pseudoreceiver, int, int) #2867
  • String-based enums #2849
  • Cast to var #2827
  • Allow omitting unused parameters #2180
    Backlog
  • [Proposal] Add "suppress" operator in try-catch #2770
  • nullable tracking doesn't work well with linq #8383
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Property Wrappers #2657
  • Proposal: wildcard suffix for using statements #2653
  • Proposal: Add the ability to execute arbitrary code in instance initializers #2556
  • "using" statement as a part of "foreach" #2541
  • Auto implement ref Property with variable of the same name #2515
  • Advanced Extents & Segments Proposal re C# 8.0 Ranges #2510
  • Proposal: Generic ranges or 'any-type' ranges #2449
  • Lightweight documentation comment syntax #2394
  • Ambiguous implements/overrides with generic methods and NRTs #2378
  • Allow structs to be marked that they require being passed by reference #2372
  • Support for mutually exclusive type constraints #2361
  • Consider having enums auto-implement IEquatable<T> #2349
  • Proposal: Special equality operator when one argument is null #2340
  • Allow operators to be defined as instance methods. #2295
  • Proposal: Removing C# stack copies syntactically via (Out-Returns) #2217
  • Allow object initializers to access previously initialized values #2193
  • Support sizeof(x) where x is a fixed buffer #2121
  • Champion "range patterns" #2115
  • GC.SuppressFinalize should have compile time warnings for certain situations #2113
  • Proposal: Allow |= in object initializer syntax #2108
  • Support non-trailing named arguments with dynamic. #2069

Updated

  • Interface static method, properties and event should ignore variance (VS 16.8, .NET 5) #3275
    9.0
  • Recursive property pattern allows reference to same property multiple times. #4120
  • Proposal: Allow ref extension methods for unconstrained generic types #7696
  • base(T) - Draft Specification #2910
  • Champion: `base(T)` phase two #2337
    Backlog
  • Open LDM Issues for Nullable Reference Types #2201
    8.0
  • [Proposal]: First-Class Span Types #8714
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Better conversion: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> #8779
  • Remove scope variance exceptions from the speclet #8777

Merged

  • Better conversion: fix formatting #8768
  • Edit C# 12 speclets for features that are still proposals #8774

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test plan for Dictionary Expressions #76310
  • Area - LSIF #76308
  • Area - Remove Unnecessary Nullable Directive #76307
  • Area - F1 Help #76306
  • Area - Document Outline #76305
  • Area - Remove Unused Variable/Values - 2 #76304
  • Unnecessary defensive copy in collection spread for ROS nullability change #76303
  • Types generated by collection expressions to implement a collection lead to a conflict in a multimodule assembly #76299
  • Test plan for "Simple lambda parameters with modifiers" #76298
  • Nullability of pattern variable on tuples causes unexpected compiler warnings #76297
  • Duplicate inline hints when in work in VB Code #76290
    17.13

Closed

  • Refactoring "Move type to ..." breaks preprocessor directives #19613
    Backlog
  • IDE0058 / IDE0029 does not handle multiple discards when at least one is from a parameter #75599
    Backlog
  • Support `dotnet_format_on_save` in .editorconfig #76256
  • Consider obsoleting/internally banning SyntaxTree.Encoding #64219
    18.0
  • IDE features don't handle crefs to primary constructor parameters #69446
    18.0
  • CreateDescriptionItems should not load document text on the UI thread #68104
    18.0
  • `ReadOnlySpan<T>` nullability is not covariant #76301
  • Quick action "Move type to new file" does not fix header or remove unneeded using statements #58660
    Backlog
  • "Go To Definition" on re-abstraction doesn't go the re-abstracted member #61268
    Backlog
  • Move type to file duplicates assembly level attributes #51164
    Backlog
  • Use LspCompletionItemKind.Variable for parameters in the completion provider #50324
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Goto/Peek definition on string literal does not go to definition #56765
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Re-enable package manager code actions once supported #48698
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Support commit character item defaults #65282
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Tests should validate client behavior #51101
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Switch to completionitem kind instead of icon #51650
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow moving static members between different type kinds #76313
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Mark interceptors feature as stable and deprecate file path based attributes #76312
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix formatting of an empty statement on the same line as another statement #76311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use TotalMilliseconds instead of TimeSpan in delay telemetry #76309
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Prefer ReadOnlySpan over Span as better conversion target #76300
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Remove scope variance exceptions #76296
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix issue with vb's "move type" moving more than just the type requested. #76295
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not format nodes when only changing their namespace name. #76294
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Fix directive placement when removing nodes using syntax API. #76275
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue parsing a k:v pair element that starts with a keyword #76302
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Expose inline completion to Razor for cohosting #76293
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix broken strings in Unified Setting page #76289
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Emit multiple deltas for a project with multiple baselines #76272
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove OfferRemoveUnusedReferencesFlag #76286
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Fix go-to-def on an abstract explicit impl of an interface method #76238
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add support for getting debugger data tips through LSP. #76285
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use variable instead of value for parameter completion items #76292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Enable LSP go to definition on string literals #76291
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Cache the MEF composition in the Roslyn LSP. #76276
    Area-IDE, LSP, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Update the Copilot powered Inline Rename UX #76001
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Close stale PRs #75963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Threading fixes #76230
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Tests.Http2ConnectionTests.AbortSendsFinalGOAWAY` #59358
  • Perf improvement: mvc #59357
  • Add ability to navigate to Blazor @page components more easily #59356
  • Blazor Virtualize Feature Bug with Scaled Elements Causing Scroll Errors #59354
  • Hash routing was added in 8x but doesn't work in Blazor Server Apps #59353
  • FromQuery Attribute Causes ModelState Issues When Name Specified #59350

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #59316
  • Minor issues with RequestLocalizationMiddleware #59218
  • JIT optimization breaks simple method on Azure App Service in .net 9 #59341
  • "Release Date" and "Genre" fields are required but visual information is not there which show this fields are required: A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create New_Label or Instructions #56312
    9.0.0
  • "Title", "Genre" and "Rating" fields are required but screen reader is not announcing as required: A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create Movies_ScreenReader #56283
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #59327
  • Update aspnetcore to use new Arcade .deb creation tooling #58073
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.runtimeconfig.json specifies runtime properties which values should not bet set by a shared framework #49486
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Investigate using Microsoft.DotNet.SharedFramework.Sdk #48013
    .NET 10 Planning
  • OnAfterRenderAsync does not fire in MainLayout .net 9 #59084
  • Cookie Domain not working #59070
  • Blazor Authenticate Exception_wasthrown #59137
  • The "ResolvedCompressedAssessts" task failed unexpectedly when 9.0.100 and 8.0.404 are installed, only in Visual Studio #59119
  • [FromHeader] behavior has been changed wiht no breaking change info #59139

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MultipartReaderStream synchronous read when using buffer offset #59360
    area-networking
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Tests.Http2ConnectionTests.AbortSendsFinalGOAWAY` #59359
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Kestrel host header mismatch handling when port in Url #59352
    area-networking
  • Remove the Shared Framework WixLib in favor of the MSI installer #59351
    blocked, area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Use `NullLogger` instead of `NullLoggerFactory.CreateLogger` #59281
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Update RequestLocalizationMiddleware.cs #59333
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm packages 2024-12-05 #59339
    area-infrastructure

Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to scroll inner CollectionView of nested CollectionViews #26449
  • "java.exe" exited with code 1. #26442
  • Windows: Embedded Fonts doesn't work in Unpackaged apps #26441
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Carousel in Windows expands across the entire page. Works on Android perfectly. #26440
  • Keep Blazor Hybrid templates in sync with Blazor & MAUI #26439
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Flyout Content Template Does Not Dynamically Update on Windows #26435
  • Shell.FlyoutItemIsVisible on FlyoutItem in Shell binding does not update #26434
  • Border control behaves differently from Frame for the TappedGestureRecogniser #26433
  • Windows Navigation Animation jerky #26432
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] ImageButton configured with a `FontImageSource` do not respect size and padding #26431
    Backlog
  • [Windows, Android] App Crashes When changing the Group Item Visibility in CollectionView #26427
    Backlog
  • Grid invalid layout when using GridLength.Auto #26426
  • [WINDOWS, ANDROID] FlyoutIsPresented is not working as expected on Android and Windows when navigating between FlyoutItems #26422
  • Windows DatePicker doesn't fill container #26421
    Backlog
  • Layout.Clear doesn't detach content views properly #26420
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexMustBeLess Arg_ParamName_Name, index #26419

  • The text entered in the Entry is not visible when using Handlers with BaseInputConnection while the Predictive Text option is enabled in the keyboard settings on Samsung devices. #26417
    Backlog

Closed

  • Similar name is provided for "Icons" Present: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26185
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Display Bug On iOS about BoxView that under initial InVisible Layout #22897
    .NET 9 SR2

    .NET 9 SR2

    Backlog

    Backlog
  • [iOS] Editor autoscrolls its text view completely off the screen if you press 'return' too many times, has no constraint against scrolling the text view off screen. Objects lag in resizing around it. #17757
    Backlog

  • ContentView is not getting invalidated when invoking the InvalidateMeasure() method in WinUI #26423

    .NET 9 SR2
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25207
    .NET 9 SR2
  • XFDF File Type Not Functioning in Input Element on Blazor MAUI Android #26017
  • [Android .Net 9.0] Maui Hybrid input onkeydown not working anymore #25996
  • Button sizing broken by .NET9 when using the Mac UI Idiom #26154
  • CollectionView GroupHeaderTemplate controls inside incorrectly show/hide after reusing dataTemplate #26150
  • The Unloaded events of the page is not triggered when navigating to next page on android #26050

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Index on owned property fails with error "property or navigation with the same name already exists" #35287
  • Why is a type discriminator not supported in TPT mapping strategy? #35286
  • Background and information around the 9.0 PendingModelChangesWarning error #35285
  • Issue running test cases with DbContext using ValueConverters depending on singleton object. #35284
  • Add support for AddMicroseconds, AddNanoseconds for DateTime, etc. #35282
    10.0.0
  • Migrations: CreateTableBuilder<TColumns> Annotation(string name, object value) should accept object? instead #35281

Closed

  • Unexpected PendingModelChangesWarning on initial creation of database via migrations #35110
    9.0.x
  • UseRelationalNulls() works incorrectly when comparing nullable bools #35277
    9.0.0
  • How do I handle: The Azure Cosmos DB provider for EF Core currently does not support index definitions.' #35264
  • How to avoid 'N' being prepended before json path in json_value() function in a user-defined function #35260
  • efcore9: Migration with .Sql that suppresses a transaction logs an error even though it works #35133
    9.0.x
  • ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT does not default to Development when using EF Core 9 if there is a IDesignTimeDbContextFactory implementation #35174
    9.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #35108 - Temporal table migration regression from EF Core 8 to 9 #35283

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35256
